CommandTemplate.name: Loop over all slices of a stack

CommandTemplate:
This template implements a loop over all slices of a stack, that would be stored in the variable 'image'. In the current form, it just display them one by one. The variable 'ip' is the body of the loop is the ImageProcessor corresponding to the current slice.
# Loop over all slices of a stack stack = image.getStack() # get the stack within the ImagePlus n_slices = stack.getSize() # get the number of slices for index in range(1, n_slices+1): ip = stack.getProcessor(index) IJ.log(ip.toString()) # output info on current slice
